Text:
Wow! This is a true gem. I'll report back after it's finished, but quality is synonymous with your name anyway.

Also, do you know if you'll be getting Steins;Gate, Part Two [Dual-Audio] soon?

It's stated for release: December 18. So I was just wondering if you knew anything on the situation.

, ill probably have it next week,
then it will take me another 2-5days to encode and OCR,
its really a hassle working with anime over 13 episodes.
Take your time! Just knowing that you have plans is good enough. I just started watching the first 12 so that once I'm done, you'd have the second 12 roaring to go.

This is amazing.
I was wondering if it were possible could you upload Porco Rosso in such quality
Thanks, Daman! Your uploads are always awesome. Looking forward to the rest of Steins;Gate!
Hey daman4life i know you are working hard but is their any plans of uploading No . 6 or Intrigue in the Bakumatsu - Irohanihoheto or Children Who Chase Lost Voices?
Intrigue in teh bakumatsu has been done for a few weeks now, just havent mux and named them yet.
To aqua pig you made your name aqua pic ENOUGH said that was too easy.

Ok, this is superb quality. 10/10 Audio and visual. 

For people who are adamant about the quality, this is great for archiving. 

Cheers Daman.
